greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = s(1)s(n) + s(2)s(n-1) + ... + s(k)s(n+1-k), where k=[ (n+1)/2) ], s = A023531.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: a024316 n = sum $ take (div (n + 1) 2) $ zipWith (*) zs $ reverse zs
where zs = take n $ tail a023531_list
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
